modName: Khag and Kenna The Giants Khajiits Couple Follower
summary: This Mod add a couple of Giants Khajiits ( Khag ( male) and Kenna ( female) ) as a Follower.
descriptionHtml:
This is the Second Mod i create but the first i add on Skyrim Nexus , Like I said This Mod add a couple of Giants Khajiits ( Khag ( male) and Kenna ( female) ) as a Follower. . You can find them in Solitude near The Market.

-You can equip them like a normal follower.
-they can carry Your things
-they can teleport to you when he is Stuck or when you went far.
- And yes they can go to Dungeons and everywhere else ;)
( If the new version ( v.3 ) doesn\'t work with Download with manager try to download it manually )
--------------------------------------------------------------
If you want Khag and Kenna in the game at the same time please download Khag the follower 2 and Kenna The follower .

--------------------------------------------------------------
Coming Soon :
 
-Some have problem , they can\'t find him so i will fix this problem by creating a new version.(done)
--------------------------------------------------------------
Thx Terrabreakcity  for the idea of a Female version ;)

--------------------------------------------------------------

Got cool pictures about Khag or Kenna ? You can upload your pics here ! ;)
--------------------------------------------------------------

If You have question ask me :)
                                                        Have Fun !!!!
author: Spect99
